Name: Asteria
About the game: Asteria is a fast paced indie platformer , wrapped up in a sandbox sci-fi world where everything is destructible, mineable, collectable, craftable and creatable . You play Ryker: the only surviving human colonist after your people were wiped out by local aliens. Now you’re stranded on Asteria, with no means of escape. This isn’t just about survival, it’s about revenge. Build your safe haven and go track down the aliens who destroyed your colony. Key Features 9 Hand Crafted Dungeons to Discover and Conquer Ranged Mining and Fighting 100+ Items Over 9 Tiers of Gear 900 Slot “Hypercube of Holding” Inventory with Unlimited Stack Amounts Full Mod Community Support Creative Mode Multiplayer!
